snippet: BETTIS--Robert. The New York Times records with deep sorrow the passing of Robert Bettis, associated with The New York Times from February 29, 1988 until retiring on January 1, 2006. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BETTIS--Robert. The New York Times records with deep sorrow the passing of Robert Bettis, associated with The New York Times from February 29, 1988 until retiring on January 1, 2006. 1/3
